web.title: Business Websites
web.description: Websites designed to connect with your customers and showcase the best of your business. Modern, fast, and built to look amazing on any mobile device.
web.benefit1: Unique design that truly represents you

menu.title: Digital Menus
menu.description: Beautiful and interactive menus so your customers can see everything from their phones. No apps, no complications, just a QR code and enjoy.

about.title: About Xinocore
about.text1: At Xinocore, we design and develop web solutions focused on propelling new businesses into the digital world. Each project is created with strategy, design, and purpose.
about.text2: We believe that an internet presence shouldn't be a luxury, but an opportunity for everyone. That's why we create accessible, clear, and custom-made websites, menus, catalogs, and digital tools for every business.
about.mission_text: Transform local ideas into digital experiences that connect, sell, and leave a mark. Make every business feel proud of their internet presence.
about.feature1_text: Fair rates designed for local businesses
about.feature3_text: Not just pretty, functional and made to attract customers
about.feature4_text: Your project ready in record time
